name: TravCom
tagline: The Premier accounting system for Travel Agencies.
description:
Founded in 1976 by Jack Revel, TravCom Inc. was one of the first companies together with IBM to develop an interface for the SABRE IUR (Semi Automated Business Research Environment). Our products, solutions and services are deployed throughout the world and we have been very successful in providing solutions to both large scale and small to medium size enterprise businesses, notably Travel Management Companies.
TravCom currently serves over 1,400 customers, in access of 10,000 users throughout the world with 3 support centers, based in the United States, Canada and the United Kingdom. The company has a highly experienced team who has extensive travel and technology experience, committed to enhancing the capabilities of existing systems and delivering an effective and seamless support infrastructure.
